description: Silky roasted red pepper sauce tossed with al dente pasta, fresh herbs, and toasted pine nuts, served with balsamic-dressed rocket.

imagePrompt.base: Vibrant close-up of Roasted Red Pepper Pasta, plated to showcase vivid textures and color. Incorporate visual cues from this description: Silky roasted red pepper sauce tossed with al dente pasta, fresh herbs, and toasted pine nuts, served with balsamic-dressed rocket.. Scene: italian-inspired table with soft natural daylight, eye-level perspective, and shallow depth of field. Capture fresh garnish, gentle steam, and a sense of homemade comfort. No people or branded props.
imagePrompt.enhanced: An intimate, low-angle close-up: a luscious, velvety roasted red pepper pasta, artfully swirled, glistening with sauce. Tender al dente strands are generously tossed with vibrant fresh basil and golden, toasted pine nuts. A side of balsamic-dressed rocket adds a fresh, peppery contrast. Bathed in soft, natural daylight on an Italian-inspired surface with shallow depth of field. Capture gentle steam and homemade warmth.
